files.patch:
@@ -44,6 +44,16 @@
         </layout>
     </appender>
 
+    <appender name="identityconnectors" class="org.apache.log4j.RollingFileAppender">
+        <param name="File" value="${logfile.identityconnectors}"/>
+        <param name="Append" value="true"/>
+        <param name="MaxFileSize" value="10240KB" />
+        <param name="MaxBackupIndex" value="10" />
+        <layout class="org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout">
+            <param name="ConversionPattern" value="%-5p %d %C.%M:%L %m%n"/>
+        </layout>
+    </appender>
+
     <appender name="test" class="org.apache.log4j.RollingFileAppender">
         <param name="File" value="${logfile.test}"/>
         <param name="Append" value="true"/>
@@ -63,6 +73,11 @@
         <level value="INFO"/>
         <appender-ref ref="rest"/>
     </logger>
+    
+    <logger name="org.syncope.core.identityconnectors" additivity="false">
+        <level value="DEBUG"/>
+        <appender-ref ref="identityconnectors"/>
+    </logger>
 
     <logger name="org.syncope.core.test" additivity="false">
         <level value="INFO"/>
@@ -86,7 +101,7 @@
 
     <logger name="org.springframework.web" additivity="false">
         <level value="INFO"/>
-        <appender-ref ref="persistence"/>
+        <appender-ref ref="rest"/>
     </logger>
 
     <logger name="org.hibernate" additivity="false">
@@ -102,9 +117,5 @@
     <root>
         <priority value="INFO"/>
         <appender-ref ref="main"/>
-        <appender-ref ref="persistence"/>
-        <appender-ref ref="rest"/>
-        <appender-ref ref="test"/>
     </root>
 </log4j:configuration>
-

@@ -11,7 +11,7 @@
 #  limitations under the License.
 hibernate.connection.driver_class=org.postgresql.Driver
 #hibernate.connection.driver_class=oracle.jdbc.driver.OracleDriver
-hibernate.connection.url=jdbc:postgresql://localhost:5432/syncope
+hibernate.connection.url=jdbc:postgresql://brandy:5432/syncope
 #hibernate.connection.url=jdbc:oracle:thin:@localhost:1521:orcl
 hibernate.connection.username=syncope
 hibernate.connection.password=syncope

@@ -1,19 +0,0 @@
-<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
-<!DOCTYPE log4j:configuration SYSTEM "log4j.dtd">
-<log4j:configuration>
-    <appender name="main" class="org.apache.log4j.RollingFileAppender">
-        <param name="File" value="/tmp/staticws.log"/>
-        <param name="Append" value="true"/>
-        <param name="MaxFileSize" value="10240KB" />
-        <param name="MaxBackupIndex" value="10" />
-        <layout class="org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout">
-            <param name="ConversionPattern" value="%-5p %d %C{1}.%M:%L %m%n"/>
-        </layout>
-    </appender>
-
-    <root>
-        <priority value="DEBUG" />
-        <appender-ref ref="main"/>
-    </root>
-</log4j:configuration>

@@ -7,12 +7,27 @@
         <param name="MaxFileSize" value="10240KB" />
         <param name="MaxBackupIndex" value="10" />
         <layout class="org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout">
-            <param name="ConversionPattern" value="%-5p %d %C{1}.%M:%L %m%n"/>
+            <param name="ConversionPattern" value="%-5p %d %C.%M:%L %m%n"/>
         </layout>
     </appender>
 
+    <logger name="org.syncope.identityconnectors" additivity="false">
+        <level value="INFO"/>
+        <appender-ref ref="main"/>
+    </logger>
+
+    <logger name="org.springframework.orm" additivity="false">
+        <level value="INFO"/>
+        <appender-ref ref="main"/>
+    </logger>
+
+    <logger name="org.apache.cxf" additivity="false">
+        <level value="INFO"/>
+        <appender-ref ref="main"/>
+    </logger>
+
     <root>
-        <priority value="DEBUG" />
+        <priority value="INFO"/>
         <appender-ref ref="main"/>
     </root>
 </log4j:configuration>

@@ -1,19 +0,0 @@

-        <param name="Append" value="true"/>
-        <param name="MaxFileSize" value="10240KB" />
-        <param name="MaxBackupIndex" value="10" />
-        <layout class="org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout">
-            <param name="ConversionPattern" value="%-5p %d %C{1}.%M:%L %m%n"/>
-        </layout>
-    </appender>
-
-    <root>
